pr_title: okhttp: cleanup channel in channel builder tests

timeline.message: okhttp: add channel shutdown to channel builder tests

timeline.bodyHTML:
This is designed so it can be inlined:

ManagedChannel channel = grpcCleanupRule.register(builder.build());
// or
assertEquals("original:1234", grpcCleanupRule.register(builder.build()).authority());
timeline.author: ejona86
